opinion.syllabus:
Appeal and Error.
In civil case wherein record was not settled within time provided by statute, appeal was deemed abandoned and was dismissed, and judgment was affirmed. SDC 1960 Supp. 33.0741.
opinion.posture:
Appeal from a judgment of the Circuit Court of McPherson County.
Appeal dismissed and judgment affirmed.
opinion.attorneys:
John W. Smith, Eureka, for plaintiff and appellant.
Mike Ronayne, Aberdeen, for defendant and respondent.
opinion.opinion_text: The record in the above entitled action not having been settled within the time provided by SDC 1960 Supp. 33.0741, the appeal is deemed abandoned. The appeal is therefore dismissed and the judgment affirmed.
